definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The positive side effect is, that the seed of Roridula can be stored for many years.
sentences.chinese: 這個特性，可以讓捕蟲樹的種子保存數年。

sentences.english: A couple of years ago, though, curiosity overcame caution.
sentences.chinese: 可是，數年以前，我的好奇心戰勝了謹慎。

sentences.english: But in fact it was McEwan's funniest novel for years.
sentences.chinese: 但是事實上這是他數年來最爲風趣的一本著作。

sentences.english: Late effects are medical problems that do not show up until years after treatment ends.
sentences.chinese: 遲發效應是指治療結束後數年纔會出現的醫學問題。

sentences.english: And it’s starting to hurt those who bought years before the housing boom began.
sentences.chinese: 這又殃及前數年於房價開始大升而購入的人士。

sentences.english: Prices for synthetic bristles haven't changed much all these years.
sentences.chinese: 價格爲綜合性的剛毛沒有整這些數年多改變。

sentences.english: What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight .
sentences.chinese: 你窮數年之功建設起來的東西可能毀於一旦。

sentences.english: Zhengrong in a few years developing a successful service company of China Mobile.
sentences.chinese: 在數年的崢嶸發展中公司成功服務中國移動。

sentences.english: Now, years of doing this (a.k.a “deleveraging”) have restored purchasing power. Debts have been reduced or eliminated;
sentences.chinese: 如今，數年的“休養生息”重新塑造了強大的購買力。

sentences.english: He had been cheating the taxman for years.
sentences.chinese: 數年來，他一直欺騙罟稅務部門。

sentences.english: But in fact it was McEwan’s funniest novel for years.
sentences.chinese: 但是事實上這是他數年來最爲風趣的一本著作。

sentences.english: Ready for drinking now or cellaring for future years.
sentences.chinese: 可即時飲用，亦可窖藏數年。

sentences.english: Low volume drip or micro irrigation is a water-saving technology that has come into its own in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 低量滴灌或微灌是節水技術，已在其近數年。

sentences.english: Hui deep south also arrive in Mexico, where he lived for several years.
sentences.chinese: 慧深還向南到達墨西哥，在那裏居住數年。

sentences.english: Even if you study every day, it can take years to master some languages.
sentences.chinese: 即使你每天學習，掌握某一門語言也要花數年的時間。

sentences.english: Now, years of doing this (a.k.a “deleveraging”) have restored purchasing power.
sentences.chinese: 如今，數年的“休養生息”重新塑造了強大的購買力。

definition: a few years/several years/how many years
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
